CustomField.formula: IMAGE( CASE( Course_Status__c , "Completed", "https://d4w000006kb3nuae-dev-ed--c.visualforce.com/resource/1664823748000/SXCourseStatusColors/Activity_good_32.png", "In Progress", "https://d4w000006kb3nuae-dev-ed--c.visualforce.com/resource/1664823748000/SXCourseStatusColors/Activity_fair_32.png", "Not Started", "https://d4w000006kb3nuae-dev-ed--c.visualforce.com/resource/1664823748000/SXCourseStatusColors/Activity_bad_32.png", "/s.gif"), "Course Status",40,30)
CustomField.label: Course Status Color
